front.title: IEEE Standard for a Precision Clock Synchronization Protocol for Networked Measurement and Control Systems

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Replaced by IEC 61588-2004 (SH95292 or SS95292) Dual-logo document Abstract: A protocol to synchronize independent clocks running on separate nodes of a distributed measurement and control system to a high degree of accuracy and precision is specified. The protocol is independent of the networking technology, and the system topology is self-configuring.
